member.name: SIP_INDIRECT_DATA
member.summary: The SIP_INDIRECT_DATA structure contains the digest of the hashed subject information.

member.name: SIP_INDIRECT_DATA.Data
member.summary: A structure used to encode the attribute.

member.name: SIP_INDIRECT_DATA.DigestAlgorithm
member.summary: A structure that contains the digest algorithm to use to create the hash.

member.name: SIP_INDIRECT_DATA.Digest
member.summary: A CRYPT_HASH_BLOB structure that contains the hash of the subject. For information about CRYPT_HASH_BLOB, see CRYPT_INTEGER_BLOB.
